fact: Donald Duck comics were banned in Finland because he doesn’t wear pants.
Before settling on the Seven Dwarfs we know today, Disney also considered Chesty, Tubby, Burpy, Deafy, Hickey, Wheezy, and Awful.
The face of comic book hero Captain Marvel was modeled after Fred MacMurray.
The cartoon character “Popeye” is immortalized in a statue in Crystal City, Texas.  Finding out where Crystal City, Texas is on a map is a trivia question in itself.
